name: GMO Contained!
description:
Try to survive on Mars until a spaceship arrives.

Tips:

  1. YOU MUST EAT, without enough calories you will die!
  2. Pay attention at the stats of fruits, calories are important.
  3. Fertility is the amount of fruit grown. It's hard to harvest vegetables on Mars, so low resistant fruit will die.
  4. If a fruit doesn't get enough energy, it will stop growing
  5. Mix vegetables, the resulting fruits will get mixed properties, so try to find the best vegetables.
